body:
Hey guys! im glad to introduce myself in this nice community, first of all i want to say sorry for my english, but is not my native language and the grammar is not my best, buy anyway, my name is daniel, gamertag: thelostvega, im another player of minecraft, my favorite categories are:

The Towers
Capture the wool
Search and destroy or Buscar y destruir
Destroy the monument
Sky wars
The Walls
and 1 vs 1 servers

So i hope to make new friends here or be useful to this community ^^

Also i have a team named CookieKillers.

Ciao~

En español:

Hola chicos! estoy feliz de presentarme en esta linda comunidad, mi nombre es Daniel y mi gamertag "TheLostVega" soy un jugador mas de minecraft, mis categorias favoritas son

The Towers
Captura la lana
Buscar y destruir
Destruir el monumento
Sky wars
The Walls
y servers pvp de 1 vs 1

Espero hacer muchos amigos o ser util para esta comunidad


Ciao~

You seem pretty cool,
I like Sky Wars too! :-)

replies.body: Thanks a lot, i start to play yesterday and the only thing that i can say is "This is a lovely community" not like others where everyone says "ez" "noob" etc... im glad of found this server ^^
